features: In wall cable management kit, perfect for keeping your flat panel TVs, gaming systems, and entertainment consoles organized and tidy.
Designed for perforated walls with a thickness of 12mm-18mm, such as plaster or wood plank walls, this tv cable hider wall kit seamlessly blends into your home or office decor.
Our cord hider intimate design features thicker hole sawing and drilling accessories, ensuring a perfect grommet fit and making installation quick and easy.
Say goodbye to messy wires and cluttered spaces - with our tv wire hider kit for wall mount tv, you can transform your living space into a clean and organized haven.
We stand behind our product with high-quality after-sales service, including guaranteed defect reissuance and professional customer support available 24/7.
wire hiders for tv on wall accessories to hide cables in wall cord hider wall mounted tv
body.description: Tired of Messy Cables? Are you tired of looking at messy cables and wires ruining the clean look of your home entertainment system? At Riozoo, we've got you covered with our DIY in wall cable management kit. In just a few minutes, you can hide those ugly cords and wires behind the wall, leaving you with a sleek and professional finish. Easy DIY Solution Don't settle for messy, dangling cables. With our tv wire hider kit for wall mount tv, you can hide those wires inside the wall, out of sight and out of mind. You don't need to be a professional handyman to get the job done - all you need is a drill and a wall. Avoid sketchy handymen and do it yourself in under 20 minutes. Your friends will be impressed with the clean and organized look of your home entertainment system. All-Inclusive Kit Our tv cable hider wall kit comes with everything you need to hide those pesky cables. Inside the box, you'll find a hole saw drill attachment and two TV cord hider grommets - one for behind your TV and one for behind your components. Plus, the hole saw drill attachment can be used for all sorts of things, from cutting perfect holes in watermelon to hunting for maple syrup in your neighbor's tree. Expert Help Available And if you have any questions or concerns, our real-life product experts are available seven days a week to help you out. So, what are you waiting for? Get rid of those ugly cables and wires and upgrade to a sleek and organized home entertainment system with Riozoo's in-wall cable management kit.Product List ·TV Cord Hider*2 ·2-3/8"(60mm) Hole Saw *1 ·Hole Saw Arbor*1 ·Hex Wrench*1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Awesome product, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I was a little nervous to be drilling such large holes in my wall without really knowing what I was doing. It came with everything I needed (other than the actual drill) to attach to the drill and make the holes to run my cords through the wall. It looks so clean and neat. The covers fit perfectly and work great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and reasonably priced
reviews.reviewText: This simple TV cord hiding system is easy to install and elegant. It doesn’t offer more advanced features to extend power outlets or provide in-wall wiring conduits, but if all you need is a simple hole with a nice cover to position behind a wall mounted TV with an exit hole/cover down closer to the floor, than this is probably a good solution for you. It includes the rubber hole covers, which are well designed and stay in place without clips or fasteners, and a good quality hole drilling bit (perfectly sized for the hole cover, obviously).Some tips: You will need a drill and a good stud finder, since the holes need to be between wall studs (and you will want to avoid accidentally drilling into a water pipe or electrical wires). Also, the drill bit is designed for dry wall (maybe even with a thin wood paneling), ideally 3/4” thick, but not more than 1” total thickness. It is best that the interior of the wall does not have insulation in it, if it does it will be difficult or impossible to snake the power cord and other cords thru the wall cavity. It is best if there is a piece of furniture under the TV, since this will hide the cable hole closer to the floor. If the TV power cord is not long enough consider snaking a good quality extension cord thru instead of the TV power cord (probably not to code in most places, but neither is a TV power cord).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had a wall hanging TV in my home office that had the power cord exposed and was always a small annoyance to me. Several months ago I purchased an 85" TV for my family room and had a professional install done for it. The installer used a kit similar to this to hide the wires, so I decided that I should do the same with my office TV. I went to my local electronics retailer only to find the least expensive kit they offered was $179.00. I went to several other retailers and found less expensive kits, but none that had as nice an appearance as this kit. This even came with a hole saw!!! I ordered it and couldn't have been more pleased with the outcome. Installation was quick and easy, even having to deal with an insulated wall. Well worth the money, great value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great with simple installation and includes the hole saw!
reviews.reviewText: Previously, I have used the much more expensive plug extensions through the wall. I tried this option due to the low cost and after the simple installation, I realized some benefits to this product that I would not have realized without trying it. I was at first hesitant thinking that I like the looks of the more expensive options better, but I then realized that I would prefer that only when the TV is off the wall. Which will not be the case.After drilling the holes in the wall, I noticed insulation in the wall. I thought this would be a problem with feeding the cables. However, I used a tape measure to feed through the wall, used a velcro strip to attach the cable to the end of the tape measure, and pulled it back through. I also realized that if I bought one of the more expensive ones, it would have compressed the insulation. So, I actually like this solution better.The hole caps are sturdy with a snug fit. The cables fit nicely through the cap. The cable hidden and it looks great!I'm buying another one for the bedroom now.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works well, comes with everything you need
reviews.reviewText: Basic product that does a simple job and does it well. Blends perfectly with our white wall. I was happy that the hole saw is included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So simple...Never using another type!
reviews.reviewText: I have bought and installed tons of TV cord hiders. This particular product was the easiest I have ever installed. It looks great too. I checked stud locations and chose a spot near my outlet and devices. I drilled a hole with the provided hole saw and then made another one halfway up the wall where the TV would hang. I installed both rubber pieces and ran the cords through them. It took less than 10 minutes and no more wires are hanging out under the TV. Too easy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great package deal!
reviews.reviewText: Knocked the job quick and great quality wall inserts! Will definitely order when installing more TVs on wall!
